mapper.select:
SELECT NM.id, NM.lastUpdateDate, NM.lastUpdateUserId, NM.vcid, NM.title, NM.valid, NM.createDate, NM.createUserId, NM.sender, NM.catalogId, NM.content, NM.invalidDate, NM.publishDate, NM.priority, NM.published, NM.attributes FROM MSG_NOTICE_MESSAGE NM WHERE
AND NM.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_NOTICE_MESSAGE ( id, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, vcid, title, valid, createDate, createUserId, sender, catalogId, content, invalidDate, publishDate, priority, published, attributes ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{vcid}, #{title}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{sender}, #{catalog.id}, #{content}, #{invalidDate}, #{publishDate}, #{priority}, #{published}, #{attributes} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM MSG_NOTICE_MESSAGE WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MSG_NOTICE_MESSAGE
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateUserId = #{lastUpdateUserId,javaType=java.lang.String},
title = #{title,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
sender = #{sender,javaType=java.lang.String},
content = #{content,javaType=java.lang.String},
invalidDate = #{invalidDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
publishDate = #{publishDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
priority = #{priority,javaType=com.tx.local.message.model.NoticePriorityEnum},
published = #{published,javaType=boolean},
attributes = #{attributes,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
